attributes.action: Extend the provision of Goverment Grants to ALL motorists wishing to convert their vehicles from conventional fuels to less poluting LPG.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present there is a very small list of vehicles that qualify for the conversion grant, if that were extended to all vehicles then surely it could make a significant difference to air pollution if many more motorists were able to afford to convert to LPG power instead.
